title: Laptops for Sale - Gaming, Touchscreen, Non-Touchscreen - Sam's Club
text:
Laptops are convenient, portable and extremely versatile. It’s no wonder that they’ve become ubiquitous in homes and offices. In fact, most people can do everything they need to on a space-saving laptop. Need help choosing the one that’s right for you? We’ve got you. Try out the  PC Finder Tool  and learn about the laptops that best suit your needs.

There are a variety of laptop computers to choose from at Sam’s Club. You’ll want to think about what you’ll be using your laptop for, like gaming, working or using your laptop computer for other forms of entertainment. Whether you're working on complex spreadsheets, editing videos, or playing graphics-intensive games, Sam’s Club has a laptop computer up for the task.

If you're looking for something to take with you on the go check out Sam’s Club’s  iPads and tablets .

Consider a  tablet  if you are looking for more convenience in your technology. An Apple iPad mini has a larger screen and can perform a lot of the same tasks as an iPhone. Tablets are smaller devices that can perform some of the same tasks as a laptop.

Sam’s Club laptop computers come with a variety of operating systems such as Windows 10 or Windows 11.

Many of the laptops provide ample storage and memory for fast and efficient multitasking, ensuring smooth performance even when running multiple applications simultaneously.

There are also many options when it comes to buying a new  desktop  PC at Sam's Club. You’ll find systems to fit your needs from brands such as Del and HP. You can expand your computer’s capabilities with Sam’s Club  computer accessories  such as hard drives, monitor stands and mounts and more.

You can also enhance your gaming experience by exploring Sam Club’s  Gaming PCs & accessories . Choose from a selection of  computer monitors  to better continuity between screens while playing games, working, or general computing. Or you can check out surround sound gaming headsets with advanced noise reduction, compression, de-esser and more.

Return Sam’s Club laptops for a refund or replacement within 90 days. Restrictions apply. Read our  full policy  for more information.

Sam’s Club offers an  Allstate 3-Year Computer Protection Plan  (For Laptops $0 - $499.99). Your laptop is covered for drops, spills, and life’s accidents, plus mechanical and electrical failures during normal use.Intentional damage, loss, and theft are not covered. There are no deductibles or hidden fees and includes premium tech support, 5-day service guarantee and easy online claims are available 24/7.

Some laptops come with a 2-Year HP Care Pack Warranty, which includes 2-Year Accidental Damage Protection. This warranty provides peace of mind and ensures that your investment is protected against unexpected accidents or damages.
